body: Natural Features & Ecosystems         Rare cave formation. Gordon Messling.  Water.  Water is the key to all of the natural features found within the Buffalo National River.  From its beginning as a drop of rain until the time the water flows from the mouth of the Buffalo River, water hydrates, cuts, creates, moves, and maintains the natural wonders that makes the Buffalo National River one of the nation's greatest natural resources.
title: Buffalo National River: Natural Features & Ecosystems
